intro:
Noodles! Soup! Toppings!
Fill ramen orders as quickly as possible and follow the road to mastery!
description:
Let's make ramen on the Nintendo Switch™!
Take on ramen orders, make the ramen quickly and correctly, then serve it up!
Share Joy-Con™ for exciting battles with up to 4 players!
Reach for the ultimate high score!

《Rules》
Make and serve as much ramen as you can before time runs out!
Pour the soup, boil the noodles, then add the right toppings!
Pay attention to the firmness of the noodles and fill each order correctly!

《How to Play》
1. Check the order - Memorize the ramen type and noodle firmness!

2. Add the soup - Be careful not to mess up the flavor!

3. Boil the noodles - Once the firmness is just right, drain the water!

4. Add the toppings - Follow the recipe for each ramen type!

5. Serve it up - Get the order correct for the most points!

[Score Attack]
Compete with players from all over the world for the top spot on the leaderboards!

[Battle]
Compete with others and test your ramen-making skills!
